author: Megan Ellis
title: The world's least friendly cities
text:
The world's least friendly cities Article By: Megan Ellis Wed, 02 Sep 2015 1:44 PM Share Your Email Moscow, Russia. Credit: pixabay.com/ imarksm 
Travel + Leisure has named the least friendly cities in the world - and the results might just surprise you. 
The magazine ranked the world's cities according to their readers' ratings of friendliness in the destinations. 
Coming out as the least friendly city in the world is Moscow in Russia. 
" T+L readers didn't find Muscovites to be particularly helpful," the magazine said. 
"We suspect the city's notoriously bad traffic and general 'aloofness' of the people contributed to its low ranking, as well as its culinary scene, which was also ranked dead last in this year's poll." 
Second on the list of the least friendly cities is Atlantic City in the United States. 
America featured heavily on the least friendly list, with nine of the top 15 least friendly cities being located in the US. 
Other countries which featured several times on the list include France and China. However the top five list is dominated by the US and Russia.
